message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $999000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $999000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $850000 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to consider a compromise. I can offer you the product for $925000. This is a fair price considering its value and rarity, and I believe it's a great opportunity for you to own this unique item. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $925000 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $875000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $900000. This is a fair price considering the value and rarity of the product, and I believe it's a great opportunity for you to own this unique item. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I was thinking that $900000 is still a bit high. I'm willing to make a serious offer of $875000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products. Can you meet me at this price?
